name: Shannon Mason
text:
The Office of Marketing & Public Relations at University of Mobile use FastSigns exclusively, because they are true to their name – we get quality signs very fast! The team at FastSigns, especially Pauline, is incredible to work with, throughout the entire process. Their customer service is excellent and some of the best I have ever worked with! Pauline is very personable and approachable, and always works to get us the best pricing on quality products. She goes the extra mile to get to know our projects in order to make our sometimes extravagant visions come to life. She is always able to be reached by phone or email, and responds quickly with estimates. Her staff has adopted this mindset as well, as they ensure that everything from the installations to the billing process is as smooth as possible.

Frank, one of the installers, is the best in the business! He works long hours and always does our installations. We look forward to seeing him on campus, because we know that if Frank is here, it will be done right! We can always count on him to be professional and do a great job.

Outside of University of Mobile, I have used FastSigns for several personal projects and every time they excel and meet my demands! No matter the project, Pauline & her staff are the only name we trust in the sign business to take on our signage requests. They can just about do it all! It’s always a pleasure to work with them!

name: Lila Johnson
text: I had an awful experience dealing with this company and will never go back. The so-called co-owner, Pauline I believe her name is, took it upon herself to take on my order. I was in charge of the decorations for my 20-year high school reunion, and one of my tasks was to have posters made from our old year book to set up for a display. I figured Fastsigns would be the place to go since they specialize in that type of work. I was assured that the posters would be of high quality and on time. However, when I came in to pick up my posters, they weren’t even ready and were horribly distorted. I was very perturbed to find this out seeing as how I was spending over $300.00 on these posters. Pauline, who was in charge, wouldn’t even personally confront me about this issue, she had one of her employees who was more helpful than Pauline was, bare the grunt. Pauline was also unprofessional as I saw her talk down to one of her employees and treated her poorly right in front of me! Needless to say, I took my business elsewhere to SignPro and they did a wonderful job in a fraction of the time.

Once again, Next Level Graphics pulls through! My husband has been working with NLG for over four years now as a Board Member for Hoover High School's Baseball Dugout Club. Recently, we have reached out to them to help create several banners and picture boards for our 2020 Senior. We were looking to make his graduation as special as possible during these unprecedented times of the Covid 19 pandemic. Because our son is a Senior at the United States Military Academy at West Point, we were not privy to a lot of the specific of their graduation and commissioning ceremonies until recently. NLG was able to accommodate what we were looking for in very short turnaround time and help make this week that will culminate in our son's commissioning as an officer in the United States Army very memorable. The quality of work and service was second to none. Thank you NLG and thank you Will and Ryan!

I first worked with NLG back in 2017 during my first year as President and they have been very attentive to the needs and requirements of our baseball program. As with everything, they have evolved in the work that they do with the ever changing needs of our program. NLG is quick to respond and offer their expert and professional advice to the many projects we develop to support our baseball program. Our baseball program truly appreciates their work, both big and small. They will work with you proactively to make sure you are fully satisfied with any project, both in quality and cost.

text: Next Level Graphics not only designed a fantastic professional logo for our business, but designed some incredible business cards and built a superb website for us. They do quality, professional, and timely work at very reasonable prices.

name: Doug Beard
text: Will and his staff are very professional and really take care of their clients. They took the time to sit down with me and discuss all of my options and what would work best for me. The quality of the artwork and graphics exceeded my expectations, and there is no doubt that I will continue to support their business, and continue to use them for all of my graphics needs for my business.

name: Gary
text: Great staff and great products. Have been a customer for a couple years now. Highly recommendend!

name: Shane DeRossett
text: Excellent work and a fair price! They made my truck look amazing! Thank you for the professional job you did for me!

name: daniel hamilton
text: Top notch.  Will use again.  Fast and great prices

name: Steve Emerson
text: Very excellent work!  I recommend them for any vehicle wraps!

name: AMELIA QUINN
text: sharp designs

name: Brandon Adams
text: Great experience,

name: Debra Beadles
text: These guys are Top Notch!!

name: Holleigh Seales
text: Friendly, professional and their work exceeded all expectations! Will use them again and again!

name: Ken Ostrye
text: Every time I have needed a sign, or sign product, Hamilton Signs has come through for me. The worst thing I have every noted is, they can be quite busy at times. I guess that's what happens when someone does their best for everyone.

name: jon vancoille
text: Great business! These guys are fantastic! They can design whatever you need when it comes to signs and do it at a fair price. Their customer service is great!

name: Missy Powell
text: Didn't have what I was looking for. Plus was way too expensive!!

name: Kirk Anderson
text: Great service and great products. Always a pleasure dealing with Hamilton.

name: Chad Smith
text: I have done a lot of work (car wrap, banner, signs, stickers) with Joey over the years. Not only has his work been very well done, when he does make a mistake, he makes it right. That says a lot to me about his reputation.

name: Jeremy Edwards
text: Awesome people that do great work at a great price!
